## ciliumctl map

Access userspace cached content of BPF maps

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for map
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

* [ciliumctl](ciliumctl.md)	 - CLI
* [ciliumctl map events](ciliumctl_map_events.md)	 - Display cached list of events for a BPF map
* [ciliumctl map get](ciliumctl_map_get.md)	 - Display cached content of given BPF map
* [ciliumctl map list](ciliumctl_map_list.md)	 - List all open BPF maps
